columns.text:
The perfect option for 4 guests with well sized verandas.

Bohemian Suite is perfect for up to four guests. Its two well sized verandas at the bedrooms have a fabulous view to the sea, while the third veranda overlooks the central swimming pool of Art Hotel. Apart from the two bedrooms and the double rain shower bathroom, there is also a comfortable living room with a bar for you to use preparing your drinks and snacks. 

A plethora of facilities are offered to the guests of Bohemian Suite, including 3 TVs and king size beds.

Room size: Indoor living: 65 sq. m. & Outdoor living: 25 sq.m.
Up to 4 Guests/ Mountain or Pool view

Specifications

  • Type: 2 double bedroom with balconies & living room. Suite up to 4 guests
  • Indoor living: 65 sq. m.
  • Outdoor living: 25 sq.m.
  • Quantity: 1
  • View: Pool View – Mountain View
  • Location: 1st floor
  • Bed: 2 King size 1.70 x 2.00 m
  • Bathrooms: 1 bathroom with rain shower

Amenities:

  • Private Mountain or Pool view terrace with sun loungers, chairs and table
  • 2 Bedrooms with king size beds
  • Natural full latex mattresses 22cm height
  • Luxury cotton bed linens
  • Microfibers duvet
  • bathroom
  • En-suite with couple-sized shower
  • Signature bathroom amenities
  • Fluffy Bathrobes & slippers
  • Hairdryer and lady’s vanity unit
  • Welcome drink upon arrival
  • Audio Visual includes: Free Wi-Fi internet access, LED SMART TV with
  • Satellite channels
  • Fully stocked minibar with complimentary bottles of water
  • Pool and Beach towels in a beach bag to take
  • Individually controlled Air condition
  • Individually controlled Heating
  • Secured windows and French door with sound/cool/heat proof double glass
  • Direct dial telephone with voice mail
  • Safe Box
  • Twice daily maid service
  • Iron, ironing boards on request
  • Room service A-la-carte American Champagne breakfast

items.seo_title: Naughty Suite | Rooms | Art Hotel Santorini
items.seo_description: The Naughty Suite features an exquisite nest-like bedroom. Double rain shower with imposting armchair. 3 verandas with private jacuzzi. Book this suite today!
